declare @taxProperty varchar(3), @voucherTemplate varchar(32), @taxCode varchar(32), @taxRate numeric(5, 2), @taxCrAccount varchar(32), @taxCrType tinyint, @taxDrAccount varchar(32), @taxDrType tinyint select @taxProperty = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_tc_thue' select @voucherTemplate = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_mau_ct_dv' select @taxCode = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_thue_1' select @taxRate = a.thue_suat, @taxDrAccount = rtrim(a.tk_thue_no3), @taxDrType = b.tk_cn, @taxCrAccount = rtrim(a.tk_thue_co3), @taxCrType = c.tk_cn from dmthue a left join dmtk b on a.tk_thue_no3 = b.tk left join dmtk c on a.tk_thue_co3 = c.tk where a.ma_thue = @taxCode if @taxDrType is null select @taxCode = '', @taxRate = 0, @taxDrAccount = '', @taxDrType = 0 if @taxCrType is null select @taxCode = '', @taxRate = 0, @taxCrAccount = '', @taxCrType = 0
select 'this._voucherCode='@@id';this._taxProperty='''+ @taxProperty +''';this._taxCode='''+ @taxCode +''';this._taxRate='+ str(@taxRate) +';this._taxDrAccount='''+ @taxDrAccount +''';this._taxDrType='+ str(@taxDrType) +';this._taxCrAccount='''+ @taxCrAccount +''';this._taxCrType='+ str(@taxCrType) +';this._voucherTemplate=''' + replace(replace(isnull(@voucherTemplate, ''), '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''';load$GridVoucherTax$(this);' as message return
